Sundials Vector Interface

The abstract Sundials vector class provides an interface through which a vector kernel and operations may be supplied to the KINSOL nonlinear algebraic equation and CVODE ODE system solver packages. Apart from some minor preprocessor stuff, this interface is completeley independent of the SAMRAI package. A vector kernel derived from this interface that may be used with the SAMRAI framework is provided elsewhere in this SAMRAI "solvers" package.

Note: These vector interface routines assume double-valued vectors.
